name: Spring Cleaning (APirateHat)
description:
A game made for a 24-hour long "Minijam". The theme was "spring" and this is my spring cleaning interpretation of that theme.

Features:

  • One-handed gameplay!
  • over 100 items to discover!
  • 1 music and a couple of sounds!

How to play:

Left click to open a box. Right click to discard it.

Good things to know:

F1 to toggle between fullscreen and windowed.

Press escape to exit the game.
